title: Web Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Language Project Design via Online Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can complete language projects in the 5E instructional model with at least 80% completeness.
Learners can utilize core vocabulary related to the topic with at least 90% accuracy based on asynchronous learning materials.
Learners can revise project outcomes by incorporating peer feedback during synchronous sessions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
